``ius`` Reference
======================

.. automodule:: ossvt.ius
   
   .. autoclass:: ius_version
      :members:

   .. autoclass:: compare_to_ius_simple
      :members:
   
      .. warning:: 
      
         The compare_to_ius_simple lib is not used in ossvt and will most likely be removed.
         ``compare_to_ius_simple`` is replaced with ``compare_to_ius`` with takes advantage the ``natsort`` function.

   .. autoclass:: compare_to_ius
      :members:
